BRENDAN RUSSO

I am a digital product designer working part-time as a UX Designer at Setvi. I graduated from Drexel University with a B.S. in Interactive Digital Media in June 2019 and am actively seeking full-time employment.

My formal training in digital media has allowed me to become well accomplished in interface design, user experience, and interactive development. Please contact me regarding opportunities in related fields.
